definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: In recent years, energy saving policy was really effective or energy consumption was underreported.
sentences.chinese: 近几年，节能政策果真见效，或能耗被低报。

sentences.english: Agricultural research program is usually expensive and time consuming.
sentences.chinese: 农业研究通常投入大，见效慢。

sentences.english: I tried,but failed,to drum into him that he shouldn't smoke so much.
sentences.chinese: 我百般劝他别抽那么多烟，但没有见效。

sentences.english: How bone up can be effective in the condition of the limited time and energy.
sentences.chinese: 但时间有限，精力有限，怎么恶补才见效呢？

sentences.english: The rural reform has achieved good results, and there has been a noticeable change in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 农村改革已经见效了，农村面貌发生明显变化。

sentences.english: Usually meth is injected, having almost an immediate effect.
sentences.chinese: 一般注射甲安非他明后，差不多立刻见效。

sentences.english: Tax cuts can be implemented quickly and entail minimal waste, since the money shows up directly in people's pockets.
sentences.chinese: 减税见效快而浪费少，因为人们的钱包一下子就鼓了。

sentences.english: What works for me is yoga; I do it every morning.
sentences.chinese: 对我见效的运动是练瑜伽，我每天早晨都练习。

sentences.english: The ordinary tax receipt does not leave out, the small knack is really effective.
sentences.chinese: 普通税票不漏掉，小小诀窍真见效。

sentences.english: Mr. Obama said the commitment shown early on has made a difference.
sentences.chinese: 他说，他执政初期表示的决心已经有所见效。

sentences.english: It is characterized by quick effect, the body can be immediately off the wart.
sentences.chinese: 它的特点是见效快，疣体随即就可脱落。

sentences.english: How soon can I see benefits from using the Sona Pillow?
sentences.chinese: 使用舒鼾枕多久可以见效？

sentences.english: The tougher tone seems to be working.
sentences.chinese: 更加强硬的姿态似乎正在见效。

sentences.english: The traditional perpetrator-centered mode of crime prevention has not worked for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 以犯罪人为中心的传统预防犯罪模式久不见效。

sentences.english: The measure of borders protected by plants can put less input but receive quick benefits.
sentences.chinese: 在埂坎上采取植物防护措施投入少，见效快。

sentences.english: Minoxidil cantake six months or even a year to work.
sentences.chinese: 米诺地尔可能需要六个月甚至一年才能见效。

definition: lit. set up a pole and see the shadow (idiom); fig. instant effect/quick results
to show an effect/to produce an effect/a conspicuous effect
lit. put up a pole and see the shadow (idiom); to expect instant results
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
to treat only the symptoms but not the root cause
to take radical measures/to get to the root (of a problem etc)
to treat the symptoms but not the root cause
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
to bring under permanent control/to effect a radical cure
